column1: '''Mark Hadlow''' (1957) is a [[New Zealand]] actor. He portrayed [[Dori]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)
column2: ''The Hobbit (film series)'']], as well as [[Bert]] the [[Troll]] (through motion capture). He had previously worked with [[Peter Jackson]] on ''Meet the Feebles'' and ''King Kong''.

column1: * [[2014]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - [[Dori]]
